subject: Re: [junit] using JUnit for UI testing?
msgSnippet: ... I am currently modifying JUnit to enable UI testing (and display of the tested component).  If you have anything related to UI testing (idea,
messageBody:
> Is anyone out there using JUnit for UI testing?

I am currently modifying JUnit to enable UI testing (and display of the tested
component). If you have anything related to UI testing (idea, framework...),
please contact me.

Vladimir
